name: Muntakim Sadik
body:
## Project Experience
#### Inventory Management System for Green Energy Corporation
> October 2014 - April 2015

> http://greenenergybd.net

It is a web-based application for managing inventory, bill generation and daily
sales records & analysis for Green Energy Corporation. It was built using
Codeigniter framework and MySQL as the database.

#### Intelligent Job search and Recommender system
> January 2015 - March 2015

It is a web based job search system built using the Django Framework of Python and Scikit-learn library for machine learning. It showed preferred jobs to the users searching for jobs and preferred candidates for a job to the employers based on a previously learned database.

#### Initiative Tracker
> 2013

It was a web-based application to track the daily sales and progress of the sales-persons around the country for International Brands Ltd.. It was built using Codeigniter framework and MySQL as the database.

#### Simulator for Battleship Game
> May 2015
> https://github.com/bh00t/battleship

It is a simulator built in java for "Inter-University AI Challenge-2015"â€‹ held in BUET. The simulator runs the programs written by two players to play a variant of the classic "Battleship" game. Players can write their AI in any language as long as it produces a binary executable. The simulator tracks the progress of the players and shows the turn by turn moves of the players in an animated graphical screen.

#### LAN Torrent
> 2011 
> https://github.com/bh00t/Lan-Torrent

It is a java application. It is an implementation of torrent client and tracker in LAN.
Multiple users could connect and share files in a LAN using this software.

#### Hall Management

It is a web-based application to manage the seat-allocation and student database
for a hostel.


## SKILLS

* Programming Languages: C, C++, Java, Python, PHP
* Database Experience: MySQL, Oracle
* Operating Systems: Linux
* Frameworks: CodeIgniter (PHP), Django (Python

## EDUCATION
** Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology **

> BSc in Computer Science and Engineering, 2010-2015 (expected)

> CGPA - 3.67/4.00 (up to penultimate semester)

## Achievements

* 9th, ICPC Regional Contest 2014, Dhaka Site, Team- BUET_hat-tima-tim-team.
* 4th, ICPC Regional Contest 2013, Dhaka Site, Team- BUET_hat-tima-tim-team.
* 10th, NSU National Programming Contest 2013, Team - BUET_Funded_By_Chocker
* 13th, ACM ICPC Bangladesh National Programming Contest 2013, Team - BUET_papyrus.
* 11th, Quazi Azher Ali SAARC Programming Contest 2012, Team - BUET_Foo.
* 24th, ICPC Regional Contest 2012, Dhaka Site, Team- BUET_papyrus.
* 4th, ICPC Regional Contest 2012 Preliminary Round, Dhaka Site, Team - BUET_papyrus.
